title: The Bible and the Great Puzzle
description:
I spoke about this video in the one about Atheism and Christianity. In my experience what's really at heart of the division between theists and non-theists is the Great Puzzle. What is the best accounting of the shape of the world? Is existence mere chaos? Is this world the creation of a lesser God? Are God's ways hidden from us? 

Interview with Po the Person https://youtu.be/XK1Y3IBKAtE
Why do Christians say the Bible is the Word of God? https://youtu.be/itzOj3PJn6A
John Walton Reading the Old Testament and the Authority of Scripture https://youtu.be/6RDAbu0KDwM
Which English Language Bible Translation should I read? https://youtu.be/_gDQaxmBgIY
Zondervan Illustrated Bible Background Commentary https://amzn.to/2GOvs3b
IVP Bible Background Commentary https://amzn.to/3iM9jAc
Christine Hayes Lecture 2 Yale University https://youtu.be/wRPqtGywkCw
The Religion of Israel https://amzn.to/30KfazI
Jonathan Pageau and John Vervaeke God and Relevance Realization https://youtu.be/N1byG4RqoTg
Paul Vander Klay and John Vervaeke Why Relate to a Personal God https://youtu.be/65CcfvXXHug
Vander Klay, Vervaeke, Pageau https://youtu.be/5enaol6dGWU

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
